trans-unit.source: Ajani Goldmane

trans-unit.source: +1: You gain 2 life.\n-1: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control. Those creatures gain vigilance until end of turn.\n-6: Put a white Avatar creature token onto the battlefield with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to your life total."
trans-unit.target: +1：你获得2点生命。 -1：在每个由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 这些生物获得警戒异能直到回合结束。 -6：将一个白色，具有「此生物的力量和防御力各等同于你的总生命」的圣者衍生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Angel's Mercy
trans-unit.target: 天使的慈悲

trans-unit.resname: M10·2 | Angel's Mercy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You gain 7 life.
trans-unit.target: 你获得7点生命。

trans-unit.source: "Until that day I cursed the angels, those uncaring lights in the sky. They rewarded my scorn with the gift of time, every year of which I've spent in devotion to their names."\n—Torian Sha, soul warden
trans-unit.target: 「直到我诅咒天使的那天，他们都只是天上的冷酷光芒。 他们却以时间来回赠我的轻蔑，我所度过的每个年头都将为其奉献。」 ～护灵师朵莉恩•夏

trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你每操控一个平原，所结附的生物便得+1/+1且具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: "The meadow sprang up beneath me, and I perceived a path from our people's defeat to our highest glory."
trans-unit.target: 「脚下的牧草地离我远去，而我从伙伴的败象中找到通往光荣胜利之道。」

trans-unit.source: "The East Wind, an interloper in the dominions of Westerly Weather, is an impassive-faced tyrant with a sharp poniard held behind his back for a treacherous stab."\n—Joseph Conrad, *The Mirror of the Sea*
trans-unit.target: 「东风闯入西风时令统治区，犹如背藏利刃、面容冷漠的暴君，准备要背节行刺。」 ～约瑟夫•康拉德，《如镜的大海》

trans-unit.source: Alluring Siren
trans-unit.target: 诱人塞连

trans-unit.resname: M10·43 | Alluring Siren | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Target creature an opponent controls attacks you this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: {T}：目标由对手操控的生物本回合若能攻击你，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.source:
"The ground polluted floats with human gore,
And human carnage taints the dreadful shore
Fly swift the dangerous coast: let every ear
Be stopp'd against the song! 'tis death to hear!"
—Homer, *The Odyssey*, trans. Pope
trans-unit.target: 「地上遍布人类血块， 这场杀戮将沙滩化为恶境。 就让这歌声传遍危险的海岸， 透入每只耳朵！ 此乃死亡之声！」 ～荷马，《奥德赛》

trans-unit.source: Cancel
trans-unit.target: 取消

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。

trans-unit.source: Clone
trans-unit.target: 仿生妖

trans-unit.source: You may have CARDNAME enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使CARDNAME当成战场上任一生物的复制品来进入战场。

trans-unit.source: The shapeshifter mimics with a twin's esteem and a mirror's cruelty.
trans-unit.target: 变形兽模仿得有如双胞胎般相同，却又似镜子般无情。

trans-unit.source: Convincing Mirage
trans-unit.target: 逼真幻影

trans-unit.resname: M10·46 | Convincing Mirage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant land\nAs CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.\nEnchanted land is the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 结附于地 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一个基本地类别。 所结附的地为该类别。

trans-unit.source: "Where are we? You must learn to ask more useful questions than that."
trans-unit.target: 「我们在哪里？ 你得学会提出比这更有用的问题。」

trans-unit.source: Coral Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 珊瑚人鱼

trans-unit.source: Merfolk are best known for their subtle magic. But those who try to fight them in their own territory quickly realize that merfolk are hardly defenseless on the field of battle.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼一向以精巧的法术闻名。 不过在他们地盘与之战斗的人，很快就会发现人鱼在战场上可绝不文弱。

trans-unit.source: Disorient
trans-unit.target: 令其迷惘

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -7/-0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-7/-0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "If it has a brain, even a primitive one, we can most surely scramble it."\n—Garild, merfolk mage
trans-unit.target: 「只要是有脑的，我们都能让它混乱；就算是最原始的也行。」 ～人鱼法师加俐得

trans-unit.source: Divination
trans-unit.target: 卜卦

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓两张牌。

trans-unit.source: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you."\n—Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle
trans-unit.target: 「解开谜题的关键就在你心中。」 ～西北风屿导师多瑞尔

trans-unit.resname: M10·50 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Djinn of Wishes
trans-unit.target: 祈愿巨灵

trans-unit.resname: M10·50 | Djinn of Wishes | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nCARDNAME enters the battlefield with three wish counters on it.\n{2}{U}{U}, Remove a wish counter from CARDNAME: Reveal the top card of your library. You may play that card without paying its mana cost. If you don't, exile it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 CARDNAME进战场时上面有三个祈愿指示物。 {2}{U}{U}，从CARDNAME上移去一个祈愿指示物：展示你的牌库顶牌。 你可以使用该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。 如果你不使用，则将它放逐。

trans-unit.source: Essence Scatter
trans-unit.target: 菁华离散

trans-unit.resname: M10·51 | Essence Scatter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target creature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Some wizards compete not to summon the most interesting creatures, but to create the most interesting aftereffects when a summons goes awry.
trans-unit.target: 有些法师比试并非以召唤出最有趣的生物来定胜负，而是看召唤出错后会有怎样有趣的后续影响。

trans-unit.source: Fabricate
trans-unit.target: 装配

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "I'm one masterpiece away from ruling this pathetic world."\n—Saldrath, master artificer
trans-unit.target: 「再有一个伟大作品，我就能统治这可悲的世界。」 ～神器大师索坠斯

trans-unit.source: Flashfreeze
trans-unit.target: 快速冻结

trans-unit.source: Counter target red or green spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标红色或绿色咒语。

trans-unit.source: "Your downfall was not your ignorance, your weakness, or your hubris, but your warm blood."\n—Heidar, Rimewind master
trans-unit.target: 「你败亡之因不是由于你的无知、贫弱或傲慢，而是你的温热血液。」 ～霜风会首领亥达

trans-unit.source: Hive Mind
trans-unit.target: 集体心智

trans-unit.resname: M10·54 | Hive Mind | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts an instant or sorcery spell, each other player copies that spell. Each of those players may choose new targets for his or her copy.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一牌手施放瞬间或法术咒语，所有其它牌手均复制该咒语。 这些牌手可以为自己的复制品选择新目标。

trans-unit.source: "All consciousness is one, separated only by a thin veil of the physical."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「所有意识都属于一体，中间只隔着物质的薄纱。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Horned Turtle
trans-unit.target: 角龟

trans-unit.source: It's a mistake to say turtles hide in their shells. They merely need time to contemplate how best to bite your head off.
trans-unit.target: 不该说乌龟躲藏在壳内。 他们只是需要点时间来思索该怎样把你的头咬掉。

trans-unit.source: Ice Cage
trans-unit.target: 寒冰槛

trans-unit.resname: M10·56 | Ice Cage | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be activated.\nWhen enchanted creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, destroy CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡，其起动式异能也不能起动。 当所结附的生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，消灭CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Illusionary Servant
trans-unit.target: 虚幻仆役

trans-unit.resname: M10·57 | Illusionary Servant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，将它牺牲。

trans-unit.source: "Illusion is a handy but fragile medium. Use it only in a pinch, or against the dim-witted."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「幻象是种方便却脆弱的媒介。 只能应应急或是对付智慧低劣者。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 杰斯贝连

trans-unit.resname: M10·58 | Jace Beleren | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: +2: Each player draws a card.\n-1: Target player draws a card.\n-10: Target player puts the top twenty cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: +2：每位牌手各抓一张牌。 -1：目标牌手抓一张牌。 -10：目标牌手将其牌库顶的二十张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Jump
trans-unit.target: 跳跃

trans-unit.source: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Humanity has always envied the power of flight. So we took it."\n—Scytha, aeromage
trans-unit.target: 「人们总是羡慕飞行的力量。 所以我们掌握了它。」 ～空法师赛莎

trans-unit.source: Levitation
trans-unit.target: 飘浮

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control have flying.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的生物具有飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: The horses of Scytha's army must be well trained. A thrown rider would fall miles before meeting the ground.
trans-unit.target: 赛莎部队的战马必须接受良好的训练。 若骑者摔了下来，在着地之前会飞得很远。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Looter
trans-unit.target: 掠夺人鱼

trans-unit.resname: M10·61 | Merfolk Looter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
trans-unit.target: {T}：抓一张牌，然后弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk don't always know what they're looking for, but they're certain once they find it.
trans-unit.target: 人鱼并不总知道自己要些什么，但他们相信找到时就会知道了。

trans-unit.source: Merfolk Sovereign
trans-unit.target: 人鱼君王

trans-unit.resname: M10·62 | Merfolk Sovereign | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk creatures you control get +1/+1.\n{T}: Target Merfolk creature is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他人鱼生物得+1/+1。 {T}：目标生物本回合中不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "The sharks envy our ferocity. The eels envy our cunning."
trans-unit.target: 「鲨鱼羡慕我们的强猛。 鳗鱼羡慕我们的灵活。」

trans-unit.source: Mind Control
trans-unit.target: 心灵操控

trans-unit.resname: M10·63 | Mind Control | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nYou control enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物 你操控所结附的生物。

trans-unit.source: "Why fight the body when you can dominate the mind that rules it?"\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「既然能驾驭对那身躯发号施令的心灵，又何必与身躯战斗？」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Mind Spring
trans-unit.target: 心灵甘泉

trans-unit.resname: M10·64 | Mind Spring | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw X cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓X张牌。

trans-unit.source: Fragments of thought refract and multiply, surging in a geyser of dizzying insight.
trans-unit.target: 思绪碎片经过折射与散射，化为炫目智慧奔流而出。

trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.source: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.
trans-unit.target: 秘术大师很欣赏此等绝妙吊诡： 他们深沉又复杂的秘法会导出简单至极的结果～只需说出是或否两字的能力。

trans-unit.source: Phantom Warrior
trans-unit.target: 幽魅战士

trans-unit.resname: M10·66 | Phantom Warrior | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME is unblockable.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "The construction of a defense is not accomplished by adding bricks."\n—Jace Beleren
trans-unit.target: 「防御工事不只是砌砌砖就算了结的。」 ～杰斯贝连

trans-unit.source: Polymorph
trans-unit.target: 型态转变

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller reveals cards from the top of his or her library until he or she reveals a creature card. The player puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles all other cards revealed this way into his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。 它不能重生。 其操控者自他的牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止。 该牌手将该牌放进战场，然后将所有其他以此法展示的牌洗入其牌库中。

trans-unit.source: Ponder
trans-unit.target: 沉思

trans-unit.source: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle your library.\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的三张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。 你可以将你的牌库洗牌。 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.
trans-unit.target: 明日属于今天就为它作好准备的人。

trans-unit.source: Sage Owl
trans-unit.target: 睿智的猫头鹰

trans-unit.resname: M10·69 | Sage Owl | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 当CARDNAME进战场时，检视你牌库顶的四张牌，然后将它们以任意顺序放回。

trans-unit.source: Some owls house the souls of archmages of ages past.
trans-unit.target: 有些猫头鹰体内居有早已作古之大法师的灵魂。

trans-unit.resname: M10·70 | Serpent of the Endless Sea | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Serpent of the Endless Sea
trans-unit.target: 无尽海巨蛇

trans-unit.resname: M10·70 | Serpent of the Endless Sea | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Islands you control.\nCARDNAME can't attack unless defending player controls an Island.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量及防御力各等同于由你操控的海岛之数量。 除非防御牌手操控海岛，否则CARDNAME不能攻击。

trans-unit.source: Sleep
trans-unit.target: 眠梦咒

trans-unit.source: Tap all creatures target player controls. Those creatures don't untap during that player's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 横置由目标牌手操控的所有生物。 这些生物在该牌手的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.source: "I give them dreams so wondrous that they hesitate to return to the world of the conscious."\n—Garild, merfolk mage
trans-unit.target: 「我给他们的幻梦奇妙无比，让他们舍不得回到清醒的世界。」 ～人鱼法师加俐得

trans-unit.source: Snapping Drake
trans-unit.target: 闪光龙兽

trans-unit.resname: M10·72 | Snapping Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Foul-tempered, poorly trained, and mule-stubborn, the drake is the perfect test of the master's will.
trans-unit.target: 这龙兽的脾气暴躁，训练不足，个性固执，非常适合测试主人的意志。

trans-unit.source: Sphinx Ambassador
trans-unit.target: 史芬斯大使

trans-unit.resname: M10·73 | Sphinx Ambassador | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, search that player's library for a card, then that player names a card. If you searched for a creature card that isn't the named card, you may put it onto the battlefield under your control. Then that player shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME对牌手造成战斗伤害时，从该牌手的牌库中搜寻一张牌，然后该牌手说出一个牌名。 如果你搜寻的是生物牌且并非该牌名，则你可以将它在你的操控下放进战场。 然后该牌手将他的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Telepathy
trans-unit.target: 心灵感应

trans-unit.source: Your opponents play with their hands revealed.
trans-unit.target: 对手以展示手牌的方式进行对战。

trans-unit.source: "The most disappointing thing about learning telepathy is finding out how boring people really are."\n—Teferi, fourth-level student
trans-unit.target: 「学习心灵感应时最令人气馁的一件事，就是发现人类实际上有多无聊。」 ～泰菲力，第四级学生

trans-unit.source: Time Warp
trans-unit.target: 时间弯曲

trans-unit.resname: M10·75 | Time Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player takes an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手在本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.source: Just when you thought you'd survived the first wave.
trans-unit.target: 就在你以为自己从第一波活下来后。

trans-unit.source: Tome Scour
trans-unit.target: 清理书本

trans-unit.resname: M10·76 | Tome Scour | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库顶的五张牌置入其坟墓场。

trans-unit.source: Genius is overrated, especially when it's someone else's.
trans-unit.target: 天赋总被过度评价，尤其是别人的天赋。

trans-unit.source: Traumatize
trans-unit.target: 精神受创

trans-unit.source: Target player puts the top half of his or her library, rounded down, into his or her graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手将其牌库从顶上算起一半数量的牌置入其坟墓场，小数点以下舍去。

trans-unit.source: "The educated mind is heavy with lore and knowledge. It's also the most likely to collapse under its own weight."\n—Ambassador Laquatus
trans-unit.target: 「受过教育的心灵沉甸甸地塞着学问与知识。 它也最容易因自身的重量而垮掉。」 ～大使拉夸塔

trans-unit.source: Twincast
trans-unit.target: 双咒击

trans-unit.source: Copy target instant or sorcery spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.
trans-unit.target: 复制目标瞬间或法术咒语。 你可以为该复制选择新的目标。

trans-unit.source: Imitation is the most dangerous form of flattery.
trans-unit.target: 模仿是恭维的最危险形式。

trans-unit.source: Unsummon
trans-unit.target: 反召唤

trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Mages routinely summon creatures from the Æther. It's only fair that they occasionally throw one back.
trans-unit.target: 法师隔段时间就会从乙太召唤生物。 他们偶尔丢一个回去也是很合理地。

trans-unit.resname: M10·80 | Wall of Frost | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wall of Frost
trans-unit.target: 霜墙

trans-unit.resname: M10·80 | Wall of Frost | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender (This creature can't attack.)\nWhenever CARDNAME blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.
trans-unit.target: 守军 （此生物不能攻击。） 每当CARDNAME阻挡生物时，该生物于其操控者的下一个重置步骤中不能重置。

trans-unit.resname: M10·80 | Wall of Frost | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I welcome it. The pasture is cleared of weeds and the wolves are frozen solid."\n—Lumi, goatherd
trans-unit.target: 「它来得好。 牧野没了杂草，狼也给冻成冰块。」 ～山羊牧人卢美

trans-unit.source: Wind Drake
trans-unit.target: 风龙兽

trans-unit.resname: M10·81 | Wind Drake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: A smaller cousin to the dragon, drakes are often seen at the side of powerful wizards who use them as airborne eyes and ears.
trans-unit.target: 龙兽是龙的远房亲戚，经常在强大法师的身旁出现，充任他们空中的耳目。

trans-unit.source: Zephyr Sprite
trans-unit.target: 西风仙子

trans-unit.resname: M10·82 | Zephyr Sprite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: "I've never understood why so many beings lumber around on the ground. There are three dimensions, yet they use only two."
trans-unit.target: 「我从来不懂为何那么多生物要在地上爬。 空间有三个面向，他们却只用到两个。」

trans-unit.resname: M10·83 | Acolyte of Xathrid | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Acolyte of Xathrid
trans-unit.target: 札兹离侍僧

trans-unit.resname: M10·83 | Acolyte of Xathrid | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, {T}: Target player loses 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {1}{B}，{T}：目标牌手失去1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: M10·83 | Acolyte of Xathrid | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like all priests, she gives her blessings only to those truly worthy of them.
trans-unit.target: 她一如所有的僧侣，只替真正值得的人祝福。

trans-unit.source: Assassinate
trans-unit.target: 行刺

trans-unit.source: Destroy target tapped creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标已横置的生物。

trans-unit.source: "This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."\n—Yurin, royal assassin
trans-unit.target: 「战争就是这样赢的～不需兵士千万，只消刀锋一舞。」 ～皇家刺客尤霖

trans-unit.source: Black Knight
trans-unit.target: 黑骑士

trans-unit.resname: M10·85 | Black Knight | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)\nProtection from white (This creature can't be blocked, targeted, dealt damage, or enchanted by anything white.)
trans-unit.target: 先攻 （此生物会比不具先攻异能的生物提前造成战斗伤害。） 反白保护 （此生物不能被白色的东西所阻挡，指定为目标，造成伤害，或是被结附。）

trans-unit.source: Bog Wraith
trans-unit.target: 腐沼鬼魂

trans-unit.source: Every grave cradles a recruit.

trans-unit.source: Deathmark
trans-unit.target: 死印

trans-unit.source: Destroy target green or white creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标绿色或白色生物。

trans-unit.source: Even the noblest of intentions and strongest of wills inevitably crumble into dust.

trans-unit.source: Diabolic Tutor
trans-unit.target: 恶魔导师

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张牌并置于你手上。 然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Disentomb
trans-unit.target: 扰坟

trans-unit.source: Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: "Stop complaining. You can rest when you're dead. Oh—sorry."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「别抱怨了。 你死了就能休息。 啊～抱歉。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Doom Blade
trans-unit.target: 送终刀锋

trans-unit.source: Destroy target nonblack creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标非黑色的生物。

trans-unit.source: The void is without substance but cuts like steel.
trans-unit.target: 虚空中无一物，却锐利似铁。

trans-unit.source: Dread Warlock
trans-unit.target: 可怖术士

trans-unit.resname: M10·94 | Dread Warlock | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be blocked except by black creatures.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能被黑色生物阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "I don't know who to pity more: those who flee from my presence or the damned who can withstand it."
trans-unit.target: 「我不知道谁更值得可怜：见到我就逃的，或是能忍住不逃的。」

trans-unit.source: Drudge Skeletons
trans-unit.target: 苦力骷髅妖

trans-unit.resname: M10·95 | Drudge Skeletons | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {B}: Regenerate CARDNAME. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)
trans-unit.target: {B}：重生CARDNAME。 （如果此生物下一次于本回合中将被消灭，则它不会被消灭， 而是改为将它横置，移除受过的所有伤害，并将它移出战斗。）

trans-unit.source: "The dead make good soldiers. They can't disobey orders, never surrender, and don't stop fighting when a random body part falls off."\n—Nevinyrral, *Necromancer's Handbook*
trans-unit.target: 「死者可成为良好的士兵。 它们不会违背命令，它们从不投降，它们也不会因为身上随便哪块部份掉下来就停止战斗。」 ～妮维亚洛，《死灵术士手册》

trans-unit.source: Duress
trans-unit.target: 逼从

trans-unit.source: Target opponent reveals his or her hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

trans-unit.source: "Don't worry. I'm not going to deprive you of all your secrets. Just your most precious one."\n—Liliana Vess
trans-unit.target: 「别担心， 我不会把你所有的秘密都夺走。 我只拿最珍贵的那个。」 ～莉莲娜维斯

trans-unit.source: Oddly, no one questioned the Cabal's wisdom in hiring a zombie to work at the cemetery.
trans-unit.target: 奇怪，柯帮竟然雇用灵俑在墓地工作。难道没人觉得他们脑筋有问题吗？

trans-unit.source: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard other than basic land cards. For each card exiled this way, search that player's library for all cards with the same name as that card and exile them. Then that player shuffles his or her library.

trans-unit.target: 在克林诺筑巢的蝙蝠，白昼酣眠于自己恐怖的收藏品之间。

trans-unit.source: "It's a vicious circle. Stress breeds pain. Pain breeds stress. It's simply beautiful, wouldn't you agree?"\n—Vradeen, vampire nocturnus
trans-unit.target: 「真是个恶毒循环： 压力助长痛苦， 痛苦助长压力。 你不觉得这实在是单纯而美丽吗？」 ～暗夜吸血鬼法迪

trans-unit.source: "Your life will set with the sun."

trans-unit.source: Zombie Goliath

trans-unit.source: "Phirax of Blood Ridge has sent a war giant at us? What, do I have to spell it out for you? Kill the giant, scoop out its skull, and drive it back to Blood Ridge. Honestly, what kind of necromancer minions are you?"\n—Keren-Dur, necromancer lord
trans-unit.target: 「血山脊费锐兹派了战巨人来打我们？ 什么，你要我一个个字慢慢念吗？ 杀了巨人，挖出头骨，把它送回血山脊。 我的天，你还算什么死灵术士的仆役？」 ～死灵术士领主格连度

trans-unit.target: 「先杀了蚁后，否则我们得与工蚁打个没完没了。 蚁后从来不觉得仆人够多。」 ～剿灭队长波札

trans-unit.target: 每一个球果都受到麻栅德鲁伊的敬重，因为终将成为战士。

trans-unit.source: "Only fools and bandits use roads."

trans-unit.source: Centaur Courser

trans-unit.source: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."\n—Ramal, sage of Westgate
trans-unit.target: 「半人马享有真正的自由。 他们永远不会因诱惑而被驯服，也不会因恐惧而遭控制。 生活在完全的和谐中，这是我们族类尚未达到的境界。」 ～西门智者拉默

trans-unit.source: Craw Wurm

trans-unit.target: 巨爪亚龙最可怕之处，大概便是他高速冲过森林时所造成的恐怖声响了。 那巨大的声响在树间回荡不歇，有如同时从四面八方而来。

trans-unit.target: 盖亚肇生世界，而后世界一片沉寂。 盖亚肇生世界中之妖精，而后世界不再沉寂。 ～妖精教诲

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, put a 2/2 green Wolf creature token onto the battlefield.\n{T}: Tap all untapped Wolf creatures you control. Each Wolf tapped this way deals damage equal to its power to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power divided as its controller chooses among any number of those Wolves.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，将一个2/2绿色的狼衍生物放进战场。 {T}：横置所有由你操控且未横置的狼生物。 每个以此法横置的狼生物都对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。 该生物对任意数量的这些狼生物造成伤害，其总数量等同于该生物的力量，且其操控者可任意分配之。

trans-unit.target: 「如果野兽藏身在雄伟橡树中，弓岂能奈他何？ 如果橡树有咆哮的野兽护身，斧头岂能奈他何？」 ～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME目标生物。 （如果该生物下一次于本回合中将被消灭，则它不会被消灭， 而是改为将它横置，移除受过的所有伤害，并将它移出战斗。）

trans-unit.source: "This wound shall be like the chills of winter: swiftly forgotten when spring shoots rise."
trans-unit.target: 「这创伤就像是冬季的寒冷，在抓出春季新芽时随即被忘怀。」

trans-unit.source: Runeclaw Bear
trans-unit.target: 符爪熊

trans-unit.source: Bears aren't always as strong and as mean as you imagine. Some are even stronger and meaner.
trans-unit.target: 熊并非总如你想像中那么强壮凶猛。 有些会更加强壮凶猛。

trans-unit.source: Stampeding Rhino
trans-unit.target: 狂奔犀牛

trans-unit.resname: M10·204 | Stampeding Rhino | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample (If this creature would deal enough damage to its blockers to destroy them, you may have it deal the rest of its damage to defending player or planeswalker.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏 （如果此生物将造成的伤害足以消灭所有阻挡它的生物，你可以使它对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成所剩余数量的伤害。）

trans-unit.source: "Sometimes I wonder if our weapons and armor are a step backward."\n—Soron, rhox pikemaster
trans-unit.target: 「有时我会怀疑我们的武器与铠甲是不是落后了点。」 ～罗克长矛精兵索隆

trans-unit.source: Windstorm
trans-unit.target: 大风暴

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals X damage to each creature with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对每个具飞行异能的生物各造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "We don't like interlopers and thieves cluttering our skies."\n—Dionus, elvish archdruid
trans-unit.target: 「我们不要入侵者与小偷进入我们的天空。」 ～妖精高位德鲁伊戴欧诺

trans-unit.source: Angel's Feather
trans-unit.target: 天使翎羽

trans-unit.resname: M10·206 | Angel's Feather | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a white spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何白色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: If taken, it cuts the hand that clutches it. If given, it heals the hand that holds it.
trans-unit.target: 若遭冒犯，它将划破强夺之手。 若系馈送，它将治愈领受之手。

trans-unit.resname: M10·207 | Coat of Arms | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coat of Arms
trans-unit.target: 武装外衣

trans-unit.resname: M10·207 | Coat of Arms | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature on the battlefield that shares at least one creature type with it. (For example, if two Goblin Warriors and a Goblin Shaman are on the battlefield, each gets +2/+2.)
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，战场上每有一个与它具共通之生物类别的其他生物，它便得+1/+1。 （例如，若场上有两个鬼怪／战士与一个鬼怪／祭师，则它们各得+2/+2。）

trans-unit.resname: M10·207 | Coat of Arms | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: A banner for bonds of blood or belief.
trans-unit.target: 代表了鲜血或是信念之羁绊的旗帜。

trans-unit.source: Darksteel Colossus
trans-unit.target: 玄铁巨像

trans-unit.resname: M10·208 | Darksteel Colossus | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nCARDNAME is indestructible.\nIf CARDNAME would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal CARDNAME and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 CARDNAME不会毁坏。 若CARDNAME将从任何区域置入坟墓场，则改为展示CARDNAME，并将它洗入其拥有者的牌库。

trans-unit.source: Demon's Horn
trans-unit.target: 恶魔犄角

trans-unit.resname: M10·209 | Demon's Horn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a black spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何黑色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Its curve mimics the twists of life and death.
trans-unit.target: 其弯弧好似生与死的纠结。

trans-unit.source: Dragon's Claw
trans-unit.target: 巨龙钩爪

trans-unit.resname: M10·210 | Dragon's Claw | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a red spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何红色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Though no longer attached to the hand, it still holds its adversary in its grasp.
trans-unit.target: 虽已不在龙掌之上，却似乎依然紧扣着敌手不放。

trans-unit.source: Gorgon Flail
trans-unit.target: 蛇发妖连枷

trans-unit.resname: M10·211 | Gorgon Flail | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +1/+1 and has deathtouch. (Creatures dealt damage by this creature are destroyed. You can divide its combat damage among any of the creatures blocking or blocked by it.)\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+1/+1且具有死触异能。 （受到此生物之伤害的生物会被消灭。 你可以将此生物之战斗伤害在阻挡它或被它阻挡的任何生物之间分配。） 佩带{2} （{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Howling Mine
trans-unit.target: 嚎叫的矿井

trans-unit.resname: M10·212 | Howling Mine | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's draw step, if CARDNAME is untapped, that player draws an additional card.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的抓牌步骤开始时，若CARDNAME并未横置，则该牌手额外抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: The mine's riches never end, nor do the moans of the spirits doomed to haunt them.
trans-unit.target: 井内的矿藏从不枯竭，纠缠其间的鬼魂哭嚎也从不间断。

trans-unit.source: Kraken's Eye
trans-unit.target: 巨怪硕眼

trans-unit.resname: M10·213 | Kraken's Eye | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a blue spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何蓝色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Bright as a mirror, dark as the sea.
trans-unit.target: 亮似明镜，黯如深洋。

trans-unit.source: Magebane Armor
trans-unit.target: 克法甲

trans-unit.resname: M10·214 | Magebane Armor | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+4 and loses flying.\nPrevent all noncombat damage that would be dealt to equipped creature.\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物得+2/+4且失去飞行异能。 防止将对佩带此武具的生物造成之所有非战斗伤害。 佩带{2} （{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.resname: M10·215 | Mirror of Fate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirror of Fate
trans-unit.target: 宿命之镜

trans-unit.resname: M10·215 | Mirror of Fate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Choose up to seven face-up exiled cards you own. Exile all the cards from your library, then put the chosen cards on top of your library.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：选择至多七张由你拥有、牌面朝上且被放逐的牌。 放逐你牌库中所有的牌，然后将所选择的牌置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.resname: M10·215 | Mirror of Fate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As the glass shattered, forgotten realities and dead memories came flooding back.
trans-unit.target: 随着镜子碎裂，遭遗忘的现实与逝去的记忆泉涌而出。

trans-unit.source: Ornithopter
trans-unit.target: 扑翼机

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the century, plane, or species, developing artificers never fail to invent the ornithopter.
trans-unit.target: 不论哪个世纪、哪个时空或哪个种族，神器师总会创作出扑翼机来。

trans-unit.source: Pithing Needle
trans-unit.target: 穿髓金针

trans-unit.resname: M10·217 | Pithing Needle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, name a card.\nActivated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated unless they're mana abilities.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，说出一个牌名。 除了法术力异能之外，具有该名称之来源的起动式异能都不能起动。

trans-unit.source: It disables with pinpoint accuracy.
trans-unit.target: 它的克制功能精确无比。

trans-unit.source: Platinum Angel
trans-unit.target: 白金天使

trans-unit.resname: M10·218 | Platinum Angel | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nYou can't lose the game and your opponents can't win the game.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 你这盘对战不会输，对手也不会赢。

trans-unit.source: In its heart lies the secret of immortality.
trans-unit.target: 心中埋藏着不朽的秘密。

trans-unit.resname: M10·219 | Rod of Ruin | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rod of Ruin
trans-unit.target: 遗迹棍棒

trans-unit.resname: M10·219 | Rod of Ruin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {3}, {T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: {3}，{T}：CARDNAME对目标生物或牌手造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: M10·219 | Rod of Ruin | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "My masterpiece is complete—and so shall be my triumph."\n—Saldrath, master artificer
trans-unit.target: 「我的伟大作品完成了～我的胜利也将到来。」 ～神器大师索坠斯

trans-unit.source: Spellbook
trans-unit.target: 法术书

trans-unit.source: You have no maximum hand size.
trans-unit.target: 你的手牌数量没有上限。

trans-unit.source: "Everything the wise woman learned she wrote in a book, and when the pages were black with ink, she took white ink and began again."\n—Karn, silver golem
trans-unit.target: 「这个聪慧女子将所学的每样东西都写进书里；最后每一页都被墨水涂黑了，她又改用白墨水，重新开始。」 ～银魔像卡恩

trans-unit.source: Whispersilk Cloak
trans-unit.target: 细语丝篷

trans-unit.resname: M10·221 | Whispersilk Cloak | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature is unblockable.\nEquipped creature has shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)\nEquip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)
trans-unit.target: 佩带此武具的生物不能被阻挡。 佩带此武具的生物具有帷幕异能。 （它不能成为咒语或异能的目标。） 佩带{2} （{2}：装备在目标由你操控的生物上； 佩带的时机视同法术。）

trans-unit.source: Wurm's Tooth
trans-unit.target: 亚龙巨牙

trans-unit.resname: M10·222 | Wurm's Tooth | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a player casts a green spell, you may gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当牌手施放任何绿色咒语时，你可以获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: A wurm knows nothing of deception. If it opens its mouth, it plans to eat you.
trans-unit.target: 亚龙不会说谎。 它若张开嘴巴，就是要把你吃掉。

trans-unit.source: Dragonskull Summit
trans-unit.target: 龙颅山峰

trans-unit.resname: M10·223 | Dragonskull Summit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控沼泽或山脉，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Drowned Catacomb
trans-unit.target: 水没墓穴

trans-unit.resname: M10·224 | Drowned Catacomb | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control an Island or a Swamp.\n{T}: Add {U} or {B} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控海岛或沼泽，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}或{B}到你的法术力池中。

trans-unit.source: Gargoyle Castle
trans-unit.target: 石像鬼城堡

trans-unit.resname: M10·225 | Gargoyle Castle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {1} to your mana pool.\n{5}, {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a 3/4 colorless Gargoyle artifact creature token with flying onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{1}到你的法术力池中。 {5}，{T}，牺牲CARDNAME：将一个3/4无色，具飞行异能的石像鬼神器生物衍生物放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Most knew of the tower's wizard and gargoyle. Few realized which was guardian and which was master.
trans-unit.target: 大多数人都晓得这塔上的法师与石像鬼。 但很少人明白究竟谁是守护者，谁又是主人。

trans-unit.source: Glacial Fortress
trans-unit.target: 冰河要塞

trans-unit.resname: M10·226 | Glacial Fortress | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Plains or an Island.\n{T}: Add {W} or {U} to your mana pool.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控平原或海岛，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{W}或{U}到你的法术力池中。
